review: Portal in general is the best puzzle game I've ever expirenced. This game itself however is exetremely fun and intresting and can easily get players hooked on it.
Very fun with co-op, and a very intresting story line plus background sotry.
A very good game, fun with friends and alone, and also very cute on the characters/hats/levels!
The best game I've ever played plus its old school and can't wait for battlefront 3 :D
the best f2p game ever, so happry its free now :)
